properties.address: Charles Street Methodist Church, Newark, Nottinghamshire NG24 1RN
properties.description: The space is open to all. We are open from 8.30 -12.00 on a Tuesday morning and serve light refreshments. There is an area to accommodate small children . Sometimes there are organised activities such as crafts. In the afternoon, from 1.15- 2.45 there is a Parent and Carers Toddlers Group during term time. There is also access to Wi Fi. The Warm Welcome Space is open for most weeks of the year, although is closed for some weeks around Christmas, Easter and summer.
properties.title: Charles Street Methodist Church
